The '''Clone Trap''' is a technique that uses an [[Earth Release: Shadow Clone|earth clone]] to restrict an opponent's movements. 

== Overview ==
When an opponent is prepared to land a physical blow, the user quickly creates an earth clone to take the hit instead. The earth clone will then revert to mud, which uniquely hardens to restrain the opponent's limb as the rest of their body is spread with [[cursed seal]]s. However, it can be overcome with enough willpower.
